pr_title: Fix DATA_TYPE, DECIMAL_DIGITS for parametric date/time types

timeline.message: Move system.runtime's tests to system.runtime package

Fix DATA_TYPE, DECIMAL_DIGITS for parametric date/time types

Fix information reported by `DatabaseMetaData#getColumns`:

- fix `DATA_TYPE` for parametric `time` and `time with time zone`
- provide `DECIMAL_DIGITS` for parametric `time` and `timestamp` (with
  and without zone)

Test `TYPE_NAME` returned by that method.

timeline.bodyText: What is the meaning of columnSize here? It seem weird that increase by N in TIMESTAMP precision makes the columnSize increase by N.
timeline.author: losipiuk

replies.bodyText: It’s the size of the rendered value, if I recall
replies.author: martint
